resources.string: If some videos are not visible, try another search option from the left menu

The coju.mobi Video Grater app can extract still pictures (in PNG format) from any video file (MP4,3GP and WEBM formats are supported). Itâ€™s simple user interface searches for all video files in your device and lists them in scrollable view. You can then select a video file and specify from what time in the video you want to extract pictures. You can also extract multiple pictures at a time by specifying the number of pictures and time separation between them.
The extracted still pictures can be saved in device storage or can be shared with others using email or text messages. You can also store the extracted images in the cloud.
